game_description: Pirates Paradise is early in development. If you want to play a finished game, this is not for you. Eventually Pirates Paradise will be a multiplayer open world sandbox, where you can make your riches however you see fit. For more details visit http://piratesparadisegame.com/
review_1: The game seems fun but… how do I move? Cus I see these other people talking about free roam and finding treasure and a shovel so… how do I free roam? Or am I just dumb?
review_2: I was excited to play but I can’t select a game mode
review_3: The game is awesome with it’s free roam but you can’t find the treasure without your hands and your shovel because you can’t even bring your shovel with you without it glitching
review_4: I love these ship or boat based games . It was sooo much fun being captain of your own pirate ship .i loved the fact i could fill my tankard in the tavern and have a drink. I felt a real scale of things especially climbing up to the crows nest . I hope this game gets lots more things brilliant keep up the good work im fed up with shooters and zombies. Truly looking forward to more.thanks
review_5: Even though it’s a pre alpha I was pleasantly surprised by how detailed this game was since most other sailing or pirate games on be fall short. Can’t wait to see what else is coming next
